params.name: type
params.description: Care card component variant type - non-urgent, urgent or immediate

params.name: heading
params.description: Heading to be used within the care card component.

params.name: headingLevel
params.description: Optional heading level for the heading. Default: 3

params.name: HTML
params.description: Content to be used within the care card component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the care card.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the care card.
